properties.areaDesc: St. Marys River Point Iroquois to E. Potagannissing Bay
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 5 at 3:05AM EST until January 6 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 35 kt and highest waves around 4
feet expected.

* WHERE...St. Marys River Point Iroquois to E. Potagannissing
Bay.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous highest waves
which could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST MONDAY
